',erai.user_phone) AS userInfo, CONCAT(eri.`start_date`,'è‡³',eri.`end_date`) AS recordValidityDate,erai.rate_type AS rateTypeRate, DATE_FORMAT(erai.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createTimeRate FROM erp_hospital_info ehi LEFT JOIN erp_record_info eri ON eri.`hospital_id` = ehi.`id` AND eri.`status` = 0 and ehi.rate_type = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_rate_info erai ON erai.id = eri.`rate_id` WHERE ehi.`status` = 0 ORDER BY FIELD(ehi.`rate_type`,1,2,3,4,0)
